metadata.name: Suspicious Powercfg Execution To Change Lock Screen Timeout
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious execution of 'Powercfg.exe' to change lock screen timeout

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powercfg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('powercfg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/setacvalueindex ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('scheme_current')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sub_video')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('videoconlock')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-change ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-standby-timeout-')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious execution of 'Powercfg.exe' to change lock screen timeout
